TEXT.TITLE: TRAVELERS REALTY INCOME <TRIIS.O> PAYOUT CUT
TEXT.BODY: Qtly div 24 cts vs 28 cts in prior qtr Payable November 25 Record Oct 30 NOTE: Full name is Travelers Realty Income Investors. It said the lower dividend reflects the reduction in cash flow from a mortgage secured by a motel in Slicell, La. Reuter
